data.name: TUnitAssertions0001Description
data.value: Mixing 'Or' and 'And' operators in assertions can create ambiguous logic. Use parentheses to clarify operator precedence and make the assertion intent clear.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0001MessageFormat
data.value: Don't mix 'Or' & 'And' operators in assertions - use parentheses to clarify precedence

data.name: TUnitAssertions0001Title
data.value: Mixed 'Or' and 'And' operators in assertion

data.name: TUnitAssertions0001CodeFixTitle
data.value: Don't mix 'Or' & 'And' operators in assertions
data.comment: The title of the code fix.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0002Description
data.value: All TUnit assertions return Task and must be awaited. Add 'await' before the assertion statement.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0002MessageFormat
data.value: Assert statements must be awaited - all TUnit assertions return Task

data.name: TUnitAssertions0002Title
data.value: Assert statement not awaited

data.name: TUnitAssertions0002CodeFixTitle
data.value: Assert statements must be awaited
data.comment: The title of the code fix.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0003Description
data.value: CallerArgumentExpression parameters are automatically populated by the compiler. Remove manually provided values to allow proper expression capture.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0003MessageFormat
data.value: Don't provide CallerArgumentExpression parameter values - let the compiler handle it

data.name: TUnitAssertions0003Title
data.value: Manual CallerArgumentExpression parameter provided

data.name: TUnitAssertions0004Description
data.value: Assert.Multiple needs a `using` before it.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0004MessageFormat
data.value: Assert.Multiple needs a `using` before it

data.name: TUnitAssertions0004Title
data.value: Assert.Multiple needs a `using` before it

data.name: TUnitAssertions0005Description
data.value: Assert.That(...) should not be used with a constant value.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0005MessageFormat
data.value: Assert.That(...) should not be used with a constant value

data.name: TUnitAssertions0005Title
data.value: Assert.That(...) should not be used with a constant value

data.name: TUnitAssertions0006Description
data.value: Object `Equals` base method should not be called. Use `.IsEqualTo(...).

data.name: TUnitAssertions0006MessageFormat
data.value: Object `Equals` base method should not be called. Use `.IsEqualTo(...)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0006Title
data.value: Object `Equals` base method should not be called

data.name: TUnitAssertions0007Description
data.value: Cast dynamic values to `object?` when using Assert.That(...).

data.name: TUnitAssertions0007MessageFormat
data.value: Cast dynamic values to `object?` when using Assert.That(...)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0007Title
data.value: Cast dynamic values to `object?` when using Assert.That(...)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0008Description
data.value: ValueTasks should be awaited when used within Assert.That(...).

data.name: TUnitAssertions0008MessageFormat
data.value: ValueTasks should be awaited when used within Assert.That(...)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0008Title
data.value: ValueTasks should be awaited when used within Assert.That(...)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0009Description
data.value: xUnit assertion can be converted to TUnit assertion.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0009MessageFormat
data.value: xUnit assertion can be converted to TUnit assertion

data.name: TUnitAssertions0009Title
data.value: xUnit assertion can be converted to TUnit assertion

data.name: TUnitAssertions0010Description
data.value: Methods decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must be static to be used as assertion methods.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0010MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must be static

data.name: TUnitAssertions0010Title
data.value: [GenerateAssertion] method must be static

data.name: TUnitAssertions0011Description
data.value: Methods decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must have at least one parameter (the value to assert on).

data.name: TUnitAssertions0011MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must have at least one parameter

data.name: TUnitAssertions0011Title
data.value: [GenerateAssertion] method must have at least one parameter

data.name: TUnitAssertions0012Description
data.value: Methods decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must return bool, AssertionResult, Task<bool>, or Task<AssertionResult>.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0012MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' decorated with [GenerateAssertion] must return bool, AssertionResult, Task<bool>, or Task<AssertionResult>

data.name: TUnitAssertions0012Title
data.value: [GenerateAssertion] method has invalid return type

data.name: TUnitAssertions0013Description
data.value: Methods decorated with [GenerateAssertion] should use extension method syntax (first parameter with 'this') for better usability.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0013MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' decorated with [GenerateAssertion] should use extension method syntax (add 'this' to first parameter)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0013Title
data.value: [GenerateAssertion] method should be an extension method

data.name: TUnitAssertions0014Description
data.value: Use .IsNull() instead of .IsEqualTo(null) for clearer intent and better error messages.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0014MessageFormat
data.value: Use .IsNull() instead of .IsEqualTo(null)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0014Title
data.value: Prefer IsNull() over IsEqualTo(null)

data.name: TUnitAssertions0015Description
data.value: Use .IsTrue() or .IsFalse() instead of .IsEqualTo(true) or .IsEqualTo(false) for clearer intent and better error messages.

data.name: TUnitAssertions0015MessageFormat
data.value: Use .{0}() instead of .IsEqualTo({1})

data.name: TUnitAssertions0015Title
data.value: Prefer IsTrue()/IsFalse() over IsEqualTo(true/false)
